scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=development watchify -p browserify-hmr -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t [ vueify ] -e src/app.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.files: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp src/assets/* dist/assets/ && cp src/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.start: yarn clear && yarn files && yarn style & yarn build:dev & serve ./dist
scripts.style: node-sass src/styles/master.scss dist/style.css && node-sass src/styles/master.scss dist/style.css -w
